title: Why are there 5 armor pen items you can build but only 3 magic pen?

replies.body: This is why no one takes mages seriously, its like they dont play the game or something. How much base mr do people have at max level? Search it up plz

All non-tanks have 30 +.5 per level. Tanks/bruiser types get 32 +1.25 per level. There are very few exceptions to the rule, but there you go. (For example Talon has 39 mr and 1.25 per level... no idea why.)

So that's 39~ for non-tanks and 54.5 for tanks/bruisers.

Armor has huge variance for both starting and per level. Some people get insane armor at level 18. For example Pyke gets 135 at 18. Thresh doesn't get armor per level because of his soul mechanic.

So tanks are more tanky then squishies seems fair. It was even worse when people didnt even have mr scalings at all. Even with 54.5 mr 33 of that is gone, and it doesnt scale either. Looking at pyke you will never get true dmg on him with how high his armor is, but if pyke doesnt have mr, mages can leave him with 6.6 mr after with all three pen items. Also its only 4 armor shred items because ad can't build both mortal and lord. It seems like op doesnt understand this or something.

Well 3 of them are assassin items while pretty much ever ap champ can build all magic pen items. 
Tho Id like it if Void was split into 2 unique items like Last Whisper

All AP items increase magic damage dealt, so I don't know why those items are in there but items like Rabandan's are not. We're focusing on items reducing *defenses* rather than damage bonuses or multipliers. As such, remove Liandry's and Abyssal mask from the list.

Whit's End is built for auto-attacking. While some AP users are heavily auto-attack based (i.e. everyone buying Lich Bane: Kassadin, Ekko, Twisted Fate, etc.), there is no item that reduces MR based on abilities used.
